name: Neptunia Virtual Stars - DLC Set
description:
Get everything in the Deluxe Pack, plus in-game DLC!

• Neptunia Virtual Stars (Full Game)

DLCs included:
• Deluxe Pack
• Bikini Outfit: Goddess Set
• Bikini Outfit: V-Idol Set
• Swimsuit Outfit: Goddess Set
• Swimsuit Outfit: V-Idol Set
• Bunny Outfit: Goddess Set
• Bunny Outfit: V-Idol Set
• Deluxe Item Pack
• Item Booster Pack
• Unlock All BeatTik Songs
• Unlock All BeatTik Dances
• Extended BeatTik Dance Pack

What is included in the Deluxe Pack DLC:
• Neptunia™ Virtual Stars digital art book
• Original Soundtrack (25 tracks)
• PC theme
• Wallpapers and mobile wallpapers
